co.uk.justcheckingin

Class EventsActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
          • android.app.Activity
            • co.uk.justcheckingin.EventsActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback

    public class EventsActivity
extends android.app.Activity
    The Events screen includes a list of the existing Events. It allows enabling or disabling an Event. It also leads to the ContactLists screen and to the Create Event screen.
    Author:
    Georgios Aikaterinakis

    • Field Detail

      • activeEvent

        static int activeEvent
        Keeps track of active Events. Used by the main screen to show the number of active Events.

      • adapter

        private EventsActivity.EventsAdapter adapter

      • backButton

        private android.widget.ImageButton backButton

      • counter

        static volatile int counter
        Identifier generator for Events. Its purpose is to provide a unique id for every programmed Alarm.

        private android.widget.ImageButton create

    • Method Detail

      • calculateTime

        long calculateTime(Event event,
                   int timer,
                   int day)
        Calculates the time for an alarm given the required arguments.
        Parameters:
        event - The selected Event.
        timer - The position of the selected timer for this Event.
        day - The day of the week for which the alarm is being calculated.

      • enableEvent

        void enableEvent(Event event,
                 int day)
        Enables an Event by calculating the alarm time and programming the alarm.
        Parameters:
        event - The Event to activate.
        day - Specifies which day the timer should be programmed.
